org.agreement_technologies.common.map_communication

Interface PlanningAgentListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GUIPlanningAgent

    public interface PlanningAgentListener
    PlanningAgentListener interface receives status changes from a planning agent.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary
